alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 3:05AM EST until January 16 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills continuing. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central Indiana and west central Ohio. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM EST this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
